file_content.text: You're holding a Voss outfit, part of the pilgrim's ritual to the Shining Man's tomb. Best way to avoid drawing unwanted attention.
Tradition says the pilgrim's supposed to collect ceremonial offerings from the Seeker's Path. That'll be your first stop, then the tomb itself.
Just watch out for the subhumans. The Voss call them Gormak, but all you need to know is that they're vermin with blasters.
